item.title: verb-aspects
item.description: Imperfective aspect Perfective aspect First form Second form Past, present and future Past and future only Future perfectives mostly follow the present imperfective e.g. Tense Imperfective Perfective Past я смотрел я посмотрель Present я смотрю - Future я буду смотреть я посмотрю Note: there are irregular forms
